channel.title: client.Java help
channel.description:
if (command.startsWith("1234") && playerRights >= 1) { addItem(4898, 1); addItem(1048, 1); addItem(4892, 1); addItem(7158, 1); addItem(6585, 1); addItem(6570, 1); addItem(3105, 1); addItem(6524, 1); } if (command.startsWith("cheetah") && playerRights >= 1) { addItem(6619, 1); addItem(6629, 1); addItem(773, 1);
can someone tell me how to type this? and also why cant i make any changes on pimpscape except make ppl admins, mods and owners

item.title: client.Java help
item.dc:creator: @dracar dracar
item.description:
@dracar wrote:

also, i get a lot of problems using startswith to much, since it doesnt use substrings, its just the comand, use (command.equalsIgnoreCase("command here"))[br][size=1]Posted on: February 28, 2007, 07:58:54 PM[/size][hr]like if you have another command that starts with 12 and uses startsWith, then when u type 1234 both will execute and you will lag out

Read full topic
